doc.title: Taxidermy: Stuff the World
doc.plot: Every two years taxidermists from around the world converge on Springfield, Illinois for the biggest event in animal stuffing - the world taxidermy championships. This documentary uses the 2005 ceremony as a way into the lives of a handful of the individuals who spend their spare time mounting dead animals (not in a Tom Green type way) and taking part in local competitions on their way to the big time.
